text:
This webinar will review the
eight primary themes identified in the focus group. Several BIPOC AAC users will share their perspectives and
the session will conclude with a question-and-answer segment. Engagement from attendees will be
encouraged during a brainstorm of meaningful action and ways to address the needs of Black, Indigenous,
and People of Color who use AAC. This webinar will review the
eight primary themes identified in the focus group. Several BIPOC AAC users will share their perspectives and
the session will conclude with a question-and-answer segment. Engagement from attendees will be
encouraged during a brainstorm of meaningful action and ways to address the needs of Black, Indigenous,
and People of Color who use AAC. A challenge in both clinical training and clinical practice is the availability of speech generating devices(SGD). The aim of this presentation is to illustrate how PowerPoint can be used to simulate basic SGD functions. There’s a broad range of strategies and devices that individuals may use for communication if their speech isn’t functional. Join us in our mission to enhance the lives of people with complex communication needs. Find out about events and webinars of interest to the AAC community! United States Society for Augmentative and Alternative Communication info@ussaac.org Nonprofit Website Maintenance by  Elevation
